document.full_text: mccormick & co  beat profit estimates for the fifth straight quarter, as the top u.s. spicemaker raised prices to offset high raw material and packaging costs, and saw strong demand in asia and in its domestic market.
document.title: asia, price rises spice up mccormick profit
lines_and_colors: mccormick & co  beat profit estimates for the fifth straight quarter, as the top u.s. spicemaker raised prices to offset high raw material and packaging costs, and saw strong demand in asia and in its domestic market.
